attributes.action: Put pressure on the BBC to bring back Tomorrow's World
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With less young people choosing science subjects and opting for "media studies" etc, the government should put pressure on the BBC to bring back Tomorrow's World.  It was a wonderful programme and as a disabled child of the 70s, I remember being totally amazed when TW showed the first ever electric wheelchair, something now taken for granted. 

How could a publicly funded broadcaster stop such an important programme when we shall always need scientists?

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
